name: Nice N'Square!
description:
Platformer and shooter 2d game!

Note: This is my first ever 2d game!  Feedback more than welcome!

Controls:

-Use WASD and ARROW keys to move!

-Use LEFT MOUSE button to shoot!

-Use SPACE key to jump!

Credits:

-Credits to Juhani Junkala and Ville Nousiainen for music!
